content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@microdata23.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.newgold (
	[C1] nvarchar(4000),
	[C2] nvarchar(4000),
	[C3] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'part-00000-tid-6109184582946030705-6481e590-8738-4602-9a6a-8d4eef72a8b9-62-1-c000.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_microdata23_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.newgold
GO
